title: TOMB RAIDER: ULTIMATE EDITION [PC]
description:
info :
===================
PC Game
Genre : adventure game / action
Language : Polish / English
Age rating : 16 +
Number of Players: Single Player

With the release of Tomba Raider Ultimate Edition version Polish developed the following titles : Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness
Tomb Raider Legend , Tomb Raider Anniversary and Tomb Raider Underworld . Other titles are available only in the original English version.

Package Tomb Raider Ultimate Edition consists of 9 games series:

Tomb Raider
Tomb Raider II: The Dagger of Xian
Tomb Raider III: Adventures of Lara Croft
Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation
Tomb Raider: Chronicles
Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness
Tomb Raider : Legend
Tomb Raider: Anniversary
Tomb Raider: Underworld

description :
==================
Tomb Raider is the first part in a series of action games in which the brave and sexy lady archaeologist Lara Croft travels the ancient buildings , tunnels and catacombs in search of legendary artifacts and objects shrouded in magic and mysterious haze of the past.

Beautiful lady archaeologist returns in Tomb Raider II: The Dagger of Xian . This time, to solve the case of the mysterious dagger from the Temple of Xian. On the way to Lara Croft will visit many interesting places , among others, Venice , the Great Wall of China , Tibet , and even the deep sea . Legend has it that when I dig in my heart Dagger of Xian, you will gain the power of the dragon. In ancient China, this power belonged to the Emperor , no one was able to deal with his mighty army. He put forward a claim to vast territories desiring to turn them into China. The last, decisive battle brought him but failed.

Adventures of Lara Croft is the third part of the adventures of the intrepid archeologist , which now has to find four mysterious artifacts from an ancient meteorite heart . In their search for Lara survive five amazing adventures located in several various places , starting with the Indian jungle, through the dark rooftops of London and the underground secret base Area 51 in the Nevada desert , to the frigid Antarctic . Beautiful archaeologist available to receive new types of vehicles, weapons and a few new possibilities of movement.

In Tomb Raider 4: The Last Revelations takes place in two places. Cambodian temple of Angkor Wat , however, serves only as a warm-up for the players and at the same time to present one of the main opponents of Lara - Dr. Werner Von Croy . The main part of the plot was located in Egypt and is associated with the discovery of an ancient temple , which was once imprisoned Set. The main character accidentally releases the deity , which brings danger to all humanity. To save the world from destruction beautiful archaeologist must complete the Armour of Horus , and summoning him to help defeat Seth.

In Tomb Raider: Chronicles , as in other parts of the famous series of action-adventure games , takes on the character of Lara Croft , an English traveler's comely and treasure hunter . After the supposed death of the heroine in the previous section , her friends recall the old expedition Lara. In retrospective missions will traverse Rome in search of the legendary Philosopher's Stone , while it turns out that this notorious artifact are also looking for two opponents Miss Croft - Pierre DuPont and Larson Conway . In Russia, Lara will want to find the Spear of Destiny , racing at the same time with the local mafia . The next mission will go back to the times of teenage heroine , studying with the Father Dunham Irish island. The last of the four adventures take place in a modern skyscraper owned by Werner von Croy .

Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness is another part of the adventures of the world-famous archaeologist , Lara Croft . It is a kind of breakthrough in numbering six years the series and is defined by its creators as a new generation of games . This is because the changed character of the game , now it is more dark and mysterious , and the game has added new elements typical for the production of adventure and role-playing game .

Tomb Raider: Legend is the seventh installment of the legendary series of action adventure with a sexy lady archaeologist Lara Croft in the lead role. After the undeniable lapel , which turned out to be part of the previous Tomb Raider: The Angel of Darkness , was responsible for the production of that team developerskiemu Crystal Dynamics , the manufacturer of such games like Legacy of Kain : Blood Omen 2 , and Legacy of Kain : Defiance .

The plot of Tomb Raider: Anniversary is no different from the story told in the first installment of the series . Lara Croft is hired by a powerful organization that wishes to retrieve a mythical artifact . Our heroine embarks on a dangerous search , but soon after they began realizes that it has been used as a pawn in a larger plot. Miss Croft decides to oppose his superiors and on their own trying to solve the mystery enveloping antique item.

Tomb Raider: Underworld is the eighth installment of the famous series of games archeologist . In his most recent part of the responsibility of the studio Crystal Dynamics , which has already had to deal with Lara Croft at distances Anniversary and Legend . Remains the publisher Eidos Interactive. The game's story refers mainly to exploration artifacts associated with the mythical Norse god Thor . Lara Croft lands min . in southern Mexico , where the goal of her interests is the world of the Underworld - Xibalba . Also visits the ruins of ancient Thai temple , diving in the Mediterranean Sea and the Arctic Ocean . In all these places we will visit sites associated with the mythological realms of the dead - Xibalba , Valhalla and Niflheim . Underworld is a direct continuation of Legends , And Lara does not disappear in the search for the mythical Avalon , where he hopes to find his mother.
